script:
1). Why don't you take a short break?
I broke my coffee cup.
That's a good idea! 
You've been working too hard.
2). Excuse me, where can I catch the subway going uptown?
You are in the middle of downtown.
It leaves at 6:23.
At the 23rd Street Station. 
3). You haven't seen the Jenkins report, have you?
No I haven't. 
No I have.
Yes I haven't.
